title: ICE with malformed `rustc_on_unimplemented` on `impl`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Found with a [modified fuzz-rustc](https://github.com/jruderman/fuzz-rustc) ### Code ```Rust #![feature(rustc_attrs)] trait Foo {} #[rustc_on_unimplemented] impl Foo for u32 {} fn main() {} ``` ### ICE output ``` error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: of_item: neither meta_item_list nor value_str | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_trait_selection/src/traits/on_unimplemented.rs:169:26 ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1585:13 stack backtrace: 0: 0x10b95d7a2 - ::fmt::hde9930b8710af522 1: 0x10b9b55ea - core::fmt::write::hd25ec0bfc1849a2f 2: 0x10b94f87c - std::io::Write::write_fmt::hca36d7396c5dc18b 3: 0x10b95d56a - std::sys_common::backtrace::print::hc155979e9e33e658 4: 0x10b960946 - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::h03db778ae686f347 5: 0x10b960697 - std::panicking::default_hook::h0d9e8bcb55be071f 6: 0x1199837dd - rustc_driver[77a613ab63d15aac]::DEFAULT_HOOK::{closure#0}::{closure#0} 7: 0x10b961145 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::h758520931cfdfde5 8: 0x11e400f27 - std[11391ffec397fd56]::panicking::begin_panic::::{closure#0} 9: 0x11e3fef59 - std[11391ffec397fd56]::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_end_short_backtrace::::{closure#0}, !> 10: 0x11e7c7239 - std[11391ffec397fd56]::panicking::begin_panic:: 11: 0x11e3f0059 - std[11391ffec397fd56]::panic::panic_any:: 12: 0x11e3f83f5 - ::flush_delayed::, &str> 13: 0x11e3f71b6 - ::flush_delayed 14: 0x119ac9a94 - ::enter::<::ongoing_codegen::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core[cfd2f0869b685cd6]::result::Result, rustc_errors[ec87cacb996b1da1]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 15: 0x119aaa3ac - ::ongoing_codegen 16: 0x1199e3fa4 - rustc_span[48482e0f8f724117]::with_source_map::, rustc_interface[a0d981abc9377f30]::interface::run_compiler, rustc_driver[77a613ab63d15aac]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}::{closure#1}> 17: 0x1199d3a7c - >::set::, rustc_driver[77a613ab63d15aac]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[cfd2f0869b685cd6]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[ec87cacb996b1da1]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 18: 0x1199a33ca - std[11391ffec397fd56]::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::, rustc_driver[77a613ab63d15aac]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[cfd2f0869b685cd6]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[ec87cacb996b1da1]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core[cfd2f0869b685cd6]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[ec87cacb996b1da1]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 19: 0x1199894cb - <::spawn_unchecked_, rustc_driver[77a613ab63d15aac]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[cfd2f0869b685cd6]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[ec87cacb996b1da1]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core[cfd2f0869b685cd6]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[ec87cacb996b1da1]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#1} as core[cfd2f0869b685cd6]::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once::{shim:vtable#0} 20: 0x10b96a1f7 - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::ha121f0b94f5d418a 21: 0x7ff814d514e1 - __pthread_start ```

### Expected output I expected an error like "malformed `rustc_on_unimplemented` attribute input". (I do see this error message if I move the attribute to the trait item.) ### Regression Stopped reporting the expected error in nightly-2021-08-28: * Commit range ad02dc46badee510bd3a2c093edf80fcaade91b1..ac50a53359328a5d7f2f558833e63d59d372e4f7 Became an ICE in nightly-2022-03-19: * The call to `delay_span_bug` was added in bb8d4307eb723850e98bcb52d71d860a4aba220a (#93222) ### Version ``` rustc 1.67.0-nightly (7eef946fc 2022-11-06) binary: rustc commit-hash: 7eef946fc0e0eff40e588eab77b09b287accbec3 commit-date: 2022-11-06 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.67.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.4 ```
